welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rushden, a charming town known for its beautiful countryside and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all the delights that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northampton Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport handles all cargo and freight flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Luton Airport is used exclusively by low-cost carrier easyJet.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 4 hours.
